resources.string: Enter the email address you used to register, and we will send you an email to recover your password in no time.
Your feedback is very important to us. Lets build a better Money Hater together.
This is DATAs project. We are Hoang Anh, Tuan Anh, Minh Duc, Van Duc, Duc Thinh. Thanks Mr.Thuan and Mr.Quang for helping us.

Your data is always safe with us. We will never give your information to anyone. We are using Google Cloud services - the biggest hosting service - which is trusted by thousands of companies and banks.
Can I use Money Hater in other devices?
Yes, in case you are registered Money Hater account. You only need to log in other devices to continue use Money Hater. But we only support Android, sorry about that.
How to change my email account?

Please contact us by sending an email with your new email to contact@moneyhater.com. We will answer you within 12 hours. Please notice that we can not change your email belong with your account if you log in through Facebook account.
Amazing android app with cool features!
